name: Space Explorer
Prompt: Transform the person into an astronaut exploring an alien planet with vibrant landscapes

name: Time Travel
Prompt: Place the people in different historical eras with appropriate clothing and surroundings

name: Mythical Creatures
Prompt: Transform the person into a mythical creature like a mermaid, centaur, or fairy in a magical environment

name: Food Fantasy
Prompt: Place the people in a world made entirely of food with candy clouds and chocolate rivers

name: Steampunk Adventure
Prompt: Transform the people into steampunk explorers with brass gadgets and Victorian-inspired clothing

name: Underwater Kingdom
Prompt: Place the person in an underwater civilization with coral castles and sea creatures

name: Superhero Rivals
Prompt: Transform the two people into rival superheroes with contrasting powers and costumes in an epic face-off

name: Wild West
Prompt: Place the people in the American Wild West as cowboys or outlaws with dusty landscapes and saloons

name: Magical Potion
Prompt: Transform the person into a wizard brewing colorful magical potions in an enchanted laboratory

name: 80s Retro
Prompt: Place the people in a vibrant 1980s scene with neon colors, classic electronics, and retro fashion
